PERSONA.NAME: Duncan
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: King of Scotland, murdered by Macbeth

PERSONA.NAME: Malcolm
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: First son to Duncan and brother to Donalbain

PERSONA.NAME: Donalbain
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Second son to Duncan and brother to Malcolm

PERSONA.NAME: Macbeth
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Also called Thane of Cawdor, General of the King's army. Pressured by Lady Macbeth to murder Duncan. Later killed by Macduff.

PERSONA.NAME: Banquo
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: General of the King's army, father to Fleance. Murdered by Macbeth and later appears as a ghost.

PERSONA.NAME: Macduff
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A nobleman of Scotland, slays Macbeth.

PERSONA.NAME: Lennox
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A nobleman of Scotland

PERSONA.NAME: Rosse
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A nobleman of Scotland

PERSONA.NAME: Menteth
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A nobleman of Scotland

PERSONA.NAME: Angus
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A nobleman of Scotland

PERSONA.NAME: Cathness
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A nobleman of Scotland, a rebel.

PERSONA.NAME: Fleance
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Banquo, flees to avoid being murdered.

PERSONA.NAME: Siward
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Earl of Northumberland and general of the English forces

PERSONA.NAME: Young Siward
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Siward, slain by Macbeth.

PERSONA.NAME: Seyton
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An officer attending on Macbeth

PERSONA.NAME: Boy
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Son to Macduff

PERSONA.NAME: English Doctor
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Reports the English King cures by touch.

PERSONA.NAME: Scots Doctor
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Examines Lady Macbeth

PERSONA.NAME: Sergeant
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A wounded sergeant reports of the revolt.

PERSONA.NAME: Porter
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A drunken porter at Macbeth's castle.

PERSONA.NAME: Old Man
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: He recalls the night of Duncan's murder.

PERSONA.NAME: First Murderer
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Hired by Macbeth to kill Banquo and Fleance.

PERSONA.NAME: Second Murderer
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Hired by Macbeth to kill Banquo and Fleance.

PERSONA.NAME: Third Murderer
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Hired by Macbeth to kill Banquo and Fleance.

PERSONA.NAME: Lady Macbeth
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Wife to Macbeth, later kills herself.

PERSONA.NAME: Lady Macduff
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Wife to Macduff

PERSONA.NAME: Gentlewoman
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Attending on Lady Macbeth

PERSONA.NAME: First Witch
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: One of the three Weird Sisters.

PERSONA.NAME: Second Witch
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: One of the three Weird Sisters.

PERSONA.NAME: Third Witch
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: One of the three Weird Sisters.

PERSONA.NAME: Three other Witches
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Other witches in the woods.

PERSONA.NAME: Hecat
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: The head witch.

PERSONA.NAME: First Apparition
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An apparition.

PERSONA.NAME: Second Apparition
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An apparition.

PERSONA.NAME: Three Apparition
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: An apparition.

PERSONA.NAME: Lord
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A lord

PERSONA.NAME: Lords
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Various lords

PERSONA.NAME: Gentlemen
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Various gentlemen.

PERSONA.NAME: Officers
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Various officers.

PERSONA.NAME: Soldiers
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Various soldiers.

PERSONA.NAME: Attendant
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Various attendents.

PERSONA.NAME: Messenger
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Various messengers.
